title: Bug 11306 - New class wizard launches simple project wizard
description: Since there are no existing projects, the dialog prompts the user to create a new project. This is very handy.
OB: When the user answers yes to create a new project in the new class wizard, the resulting dialog is the first page of the generic new project wizard instead of the expected Java Project wizard.
EB: The new class wizard should open the Java Project wizard when the user chooses to create a new project.
SR: To reproduce the issue: In a new workspace, press the "New Class" button in the Java perspective and verify if the resulting dialog is the first page of the generic new project wizard.
